title: Kate Green – 2020 Comments on Publishing SAGE Advice
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Secretary of State for Education, on 29 December 2020.
content:
The Government cannot continue to hide from reality and must urgently publish the scientific advice on the return of schools.
